Text:
Not lost, not dead, nothing more drastic than the universe turning on me with my computer as the cudgle. The wheels came off last Tuesday, thought a couple days downtime ... became "maybe Sunday" and now, I honestly don't know. Lotsa sob stories not to bother you with - but I miss this, I miss all of you.
.
Hope to be back soon, meanwhile messages from the universe tell me flow with it and recharge (wait for soldering iron, t6 & drive board for the drive that has ALL that I've posted - long story).
.
Possibly one of you whom I've been double daring to step up might for a bit?
.
mebbe not.
.
AVIGUY

p.s. - was a bit frazzled thinking this was a WEB-DL
AVIGUY, could you upload Girls S02E10. Very appreciate
I was wondering what happened to you. Enjoy the break and come back when you can
